node.title: 'I was slightly horrified': Mother recounts seven-week-old baby's COVID swab amid SA hotel quarantine saga
node.description: A new motherÂ and her baby have been bundled into a medi-hotel, despite having a permit to quarantine at home after landing in Adelaide, as questions mount about the systems in place for travellers returning to SA.
node.content:
["A new mother\u00a0and her baby have been bundled into a medi-hotel, despite having a permit to quarantine at home after landing in Adelaide, as questions mount about the systems in place for travellers returning to SA.", "It follows former Prime Minister Julia Gillard being sent to an Adelaide medi-hotel despite prior approvals.", "Georgina Brill told the ABC she and her seven-week-old baby had permission to quarantine at home, however, when she arrived at Adelaide Airport from Singapore, she was whisked to a medi-hotel.", "Her and her young daughter were then given COVID tests.\u00a0", "\"I was slightly horrified when they turned up to my hotel room and\u00a0wanted to do a PCR test for a seven-week-old baby,\" she said.", "\"I videoed it because I was really worried that something [would] happen\u00a0to her. But it was quite quick. They didn't go in too deep, but it was just so unnecessary.", "\"You would just think following common sense that, provided the parent's has a negative test, the baby is likely to have a negative test as well.\"", "", "
Georgina Brill and her daughter Ava were eventually released from hotel quarantine to continue it at their family home in Adelaide.(Supplied: Georgina Brill)
", "Ms Brill said the complete lack of information from authorities about why she was being taken to a medi-hotel and how long she would be staying only added to her stress.", "She also found it hard to sterilise\u00a0feeding bottles once she arrived at the hotel.", "\"There was no stove. It was literally just a hotel room with this fridge,\u00a0kettle and the minibar,\" Ms Brill said.", "\"So, I had to\u00a0boil the kettle and try and somehow sterilise these bottles \u2014\u00a0there was no washing detergent, there was no real utensils to clean\u00a0bottles with. It was actually ... a nightmare.", "", "
Ava Brill sleeping in her mother's arms en route to Adelaide from Singapore.(Supplied: Georgina Brill)
", "\"It just created more anxiety and stress in me, which was then transferred to the newborn baby and it just really wasn't a pleasant experience overall.\"", "She was tested last night and said her results were fast-tracked by SA Health due to caring for a newborn and she was able to leave the medi-hotel.\u00a0", "Georgina Brill's mother, Kaye, had prepared to leave her home to allow her daughter to quarantine alone.", "She said the whole experience had been extremely stressful.", "", "
Seven-week-old Ava Brill sleeps on a flight from Singapore to Adelaide on December 6, 2021.(Supplied: Georgina Brill)
", "\"The cost even to the taxpayers for the waste of effort, energy, dollars today in that farcical hotel management exercise was deplorable and in fact I don't know that Mr Marshall's government will get my vote,\" she said.", "\"The grinches at SA Health really need to think about what they're doing to the community as a whole.\"", "
'Nobody's been able to say what happens next'
", "The ABC has spoken to several people still stuck in hotel quarantine, despite receiving pre-approval to quarantine at home and returning a negative result.", "Peter Rowland has been in the Peppers Medi-Hotel since arriving from Doha on Saturday afternoon.", "He had been at a conference in Chicago for his Tonsley-based X-ray technology business.", "Mr Rowland said he had been pre-approved to complete his quarantine at his home in the Adelaide Hills.", "\"All that changed apparently while we were in the air,\" he said.", "\"Without anyone being able to explain what was happening we were bundled into a bus and into a medi-hotel.\"", "On Sunday he returned a negative COVID-19 test, but remains in the hotel with no indication of when he will be able to leave.", "\"Nobody's been able to say what happens next,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"Every day I've been told you should be heading home tomorrow to complete home quarantine, we'll call you and tell you, but the phone never rings.\"", "Mr Rowland said the sudden change in rules and unpredictability around border and quarantine requirements is extremely damaging for companies like his.", "\"It's really hurting the business,\" he said.", "\"It's the lack of predictability that's really hard to cope with, you've got to be able to plan and you've got to be able to travel.", "\"Our whole company's livelihood is international, we export almost everything we make, so these international relations are critical.\"", "
SA Health says Omicron impacting border rules
", "In a statement, SA Health said up until November 27, international arrivals pre-approved for home quarantine were able to directly travel from the airport to their home.", "\"With the WHO declaration regarding Omicron, in an abundance of caution, international arrivals have been taken to a medi-hotel, for a short period of time to allow for assessment of the suitability of the home quarantine arrangement and to ensure testing compliance,\" a spokeswoman said.", "\"The processes at the airport are being reviewed to support travellers approved to home quarantine to safely transit directly home, as well as ensuring testing upon disembarkation of the flight.\"", "The ABC has been provided letters sent to travellers from SA Health\u00a0granting approval for home quarantine after November 27.\u00a0", "", "
